## CustomHttpHeaders."Client-SDK" property

Additional agents and their versions used to create the Answers experience. The information for these agents is added to the Client-SDK HTTP header for Answers API requests along with that of the ANSWERS\_HEADLESS and ANSWERS\_CORE agents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'Client-SDK'?: CustomClientSDKHeaderValues;
```
